conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and practical shorts that offer functionality and a good fit for various activities. within my expected price range: [27.78, 34.9]

Based on your budget range, I recommend the Champion Men's Shorts, Everyday Shorts, Lightweight Long Shorts for Men (Reg. Or Big & Tall) ($15.0). These shorts offer comfort and quality with features like an elastic drawcord waistband and deep side-seam pockets. If you are interested, I also have a potentially purchasable candidate available: <Champion Men's Shorts, Everyday Shorts, Lightweight Long Shorts for Men (Reg. Or Big & Tall) (B0C5YY1Y34)>.
